item.title: Using the Microsoft Defender for Endpoint Files API to Validate Malware Hashes
item.description: Introduction Security advisories frequently include file hashes (SHA-1 or SHA-256) as indicators of compromise (IoCs). Microsoft Defender for Endpoint (MDE) exposes a Files API that lets SecOps quickly look up Microsoft’s verdict and metadata for a given hash. This enables rapid assessment—whether a file is classified as Malicious, Suspicious, Clean, or Unknown—and helps analysts decide the next response action without needing to download or execute the sample.
